content.value:
Would be interesting for teams to have (informal) code review reviews once or twice yearly to calibrate nit-picking levels and gauge the split in focus between syntax, structure and UX/DX.

You can write docs for this stuff but I think many of us can learn from each other.
content.html: Would be interesting for teams to have (informal) code review reviews once or twice yearly to calibrate nit-picking levels and gauge the split in focus between syntax, structure and UX/DX. You can write docs for this stuff but I think many of us can learn from each other.
